src.clf.predict module¶

Description:

Predicting probability for medical labels from saved model Showing top features model uses per class in general Showing features from sample the model uses to predict top classes

src.clf.predict.lime_explainer(model: Pipeline, value: str)¶

Get features the model used for top predicted classes

Parameters:

  • model (imblearn.pipeline.Pipeline) – best model from train.py

  • value (str) – sample

Returns:

Features from sample the model used to predict classes

Return type:

dict
